mapper.select:
SELECT board.id, board.creatorId, user.name as writerName, user.profileUrl as profileUrl, user.kImageUrl as kImageUrl, user.patientId as patientId, user.userType as userType, user.userLevel as userLevel, user.position as position, board.text, board.createdTime, board.updatedTime, board.patientId, board.status, board.type, board.expireDate, board.accessLevel, (SELECT count(*) FROM Board_reply reply WHERE reply.boardId = board.id) AS replyCount
FROM Board_main board
LEFT JOIN Person AS user ON user.NUM = board.creatorId
${userLevel} >= board.accessLevel
ORDER BY board.createdTime DESC limit ${from}, ${pageSize}

select board.id, board.creatorId, user.name as writerName, user.profileUrl as profileUrl, user.kImageUrl as kImageUrl, user.patientId as patientId, user.userType as userType, user.userLevel as userLevel, user.position as position, board.text, board.createdTime, board.updatedTime, board.patientId, board.status, board.type, board.expireDate, board.accessLevel, Count(reply.id) AS replyCount from Board_main board LEFT JOIN Board_reply AS reply ON reply.boardId = board.id LEFT JOIN Person AS user ON user.NUM = board.creatorId
